description.0: A long spear tainted black by unrelenting battle, it shines with an ethereal glow beneath the ghostly blue light of lantern-fire.

0.0: For 3.5s after using an Elemental Burst, the equipping character's Lunar-Charged DMG dealt to opponents is increased by <cryo>36%</cryo>. Additionally, after triggering a Lunar-Charged reaction, the equipping character will gain Requiem of Ruin: CRIT DMG is increased by <cryo>28%</cryo> for 6s. They will also regain <cryo>12</cryo> Elemental Energy. Elemental Energy can be restored this way once every 14s.
